tool_description: Get product / sneaker details & prices from StockX.com, Goat.com and Klekt.com
name: Sneaker DB
title: Sneaker DB

api_list.name: GET product details & prices
api_list.description: Fetch product data with latest resell prices.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sneaker-db.p.rapidapi.com/product/prices/CP9654"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sneaker-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sneaker-db.p.rapidapi.com/product/prices/{style_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sneaker-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
